mapper.insert: insert into date_record (id, userid2, userid1, start_date, end_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select id, userid2, userid1, start_date, end_date from date_record
